snippet.title: Welcome to Dragon's Dogma 2 - Presented by Ian McShane
snippet.description:
Subtitles available in English, LATAM Spanish, and Brazilian Portuguese (click the CC/settings icons).

Welcome to the captivating and immersive fantasy world of Dragon's Dogma 2. The incomparable Ian McShane walks you through what lies in store in this epic action-RPG, launching on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam on March 22, 2024. 

Get a head start by creating your Arisen and main Pawn with the Character Creator & Storage tool - available to download for free on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam.

https://www.dragonsdogma.com/2/
https://twitter.com/DragonsDogma
https://www.facebook.com/dragonsdogma
https://www.instagram.com/dragonsdogmagame/

Catch up on the first trailer: https://youtu.be/FOCCI53JYBA?si=aPWOyqGHBGfgMZUO
Main Trailer: https://youtu.be/8dt1S_QUBYw
Action Trailer: https://youtu.be/k8NhHO1QOaA
